body_html: Looks like you are running out of GPU memory, one thing which I would suggest is instead of loading all the images at once( which I see is 1945), I would try to load them in batches (maybe ~ 100) to reduce the memory foot print.

body: Looks like you are running out of GPU memory, one thing which I would suggest is instead of loading all the images at once( which I see is 1945), I would try to load them in batches (maybe ~ 100) to reduce the memory foot print.
